description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android application that manages bottom tab navigation with four screens: Home, Search, Library, and Now Playing. It sets up the navigation logic and fragment transactions based on user selections.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity hosting bottom navigation with four fragments, handling user navigation interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the bottom navigation view, and defaults to the Home fragment.

methods.name: onNavigationItemSelected
methods.description: Handles navigation item selection, invoking fragment switches.

methods.name: navigateTo
methods.description: Performs fragment transaction to display the selected screen based on menu item ID.
